archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0909
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I am seeing what access types are available at my address, I want to look for the answers online and give my info, so that if I come back Vodafone has remembered I don't have to start over again

properties.value: DS: If it is existing customer it can be PIM entity. If not the address form is autocompleted by browser

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
